## Support Types

#### ConfigurationAggregatorAccountAggregationSource

<table class="ml-6">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Argument</th>
            <th>Type</th>
            <th>Description</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">account<wbr>Ids</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>Array&lt;<wbr>string<wbr>&gt;</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Required) List of 12-digit account IDs of the account(s) being aggregated.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">all<wbr>Regions</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>boolean</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) If true, aggregate existing AWS Config regions and future regions.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">regions</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>Array&lt;<wbr>string<wbr>&gt;</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) List of source regions being aggregated.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

        </tr>

            <td class="align-top"><code>string</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}

{{% /md %}}</td>
